website_summaries.verdict: Looks great, slip-resistant, and comfortable for as long as they last. Mixed reviews on durability.
pros: Available in a variety of colors
cons: Skip resistant material may wear off over time
May run small, so keep this in mind when ordering

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I say they fit as "I" expected. Order a whole size larger than what you usually wear. Found out about doing so when I'd bought a pair previously from a uniform company that comes to my work place. And BTW, that company is now charging $45 for them. So $29 is a great price to pay! They are really nice as nurse's shoes. I have worn my first pair 5 days a week for over a year and they're still in excellent condition. I just wanted a new color and was happy to see them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bailey

customer_reviews.title: They fit good. Not big and not small
customer_reviews.text: As per the past reviews, you must order a size up or else they will be small. I wear a size 9 1/2 and I ordered a size 10. They fit good. Not big and not small.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size up from my regular shoe size to ensure proper fit after reading reviews saying they were running small. The memory foam padding makes the shoe seem smaller at first probably, especially around the heel area. Be sure to fit your heel in proper place, lace, then stand to see where your big toe is. If the big toe it sits less than a thumbnail close to the end of the shoe, then the shoe is probably too small. Love the color, comfort, value, and plan on buying another pair in a different color. Great item! Bought them for my everyday walking around/errand shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small in the toe, not overall a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a work shoe, comfortable enough to stand in, as well as gonup and down a ladder. Plus, I wanted them to be black. These worked out pretty well. Smaller in the toes than I would’ve liked, so if I reorder down the road I will see if they have a wider width. I always use an insole as I have high arches, so I cant say how the memory foam portion works, but the shoe has worked out well for the week now I’ve been using them. Even better, there’s no squeak when I walk through the rain and into work. My old tenors used to squeak badly on the tile floors, so that’s a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Darci Noelle Maurer

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. I work in a warehouse and I'm on my feet all day. These are extremely comfortable. They look somewhat "plastic'ish", but for $36.00, very very comfortable. After wearing, I would recommend ordering a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazballz shoes
customer_reviews.text: I intentionally ordered a half size too big. They fit perfect. I LOVE these shoes. The color is spot on. They are so comfy. I work 10 hour shifts and I'm on my feet for the entire shift. (Except for like a break once and a while) my feet do not hurt at all after all is said and done. I will for sure order these babies again. I am so thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: j51096

customer_reviews.title: Run super super tight and small
customer_reviews.text: I never have trouble with sizing. I am normally a size 7 and so according to the reviews I ordered a size 7.5. When it came it was just super tight in the toe area and I assumed that perhaps it was just because they ran even smaller than people were saying. I returned them and ordered a full size larger than my normal size, ordering the size 8 and although the length was okay, they were some of the most narrow shoes I've ever worn and just too uncomfortably constricting. Returned them. I don't want to wear shoes for work that I I am constantly aware of being on my feet because they are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Loved them until...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved these shoes. Fit was great, very comfortable and slip resistance was except able. Wore them at work 3-4 times per week. I have not machine washed these shoes only hand wiped. Then in the fifth week they began to separate on the bottom and by the 6th week they became unwearable as they were making me trip and were unsafe. I would hope this was just a lemon pair but be wary when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jazell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but fall apart quick
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit to my expectations and they are comfortable however after only having them for a few weeks, the bottoms are starting to fall apart. I wear these 5 days a week for 8+hrs a day, I need shoes that are going to hold up. If you're on your feet a lot, I do not recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin B.

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and the non slip surface on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product fits great/. I love the color and the non slip surface on the bottom is great. Since I am on my feet a lot for work, the soles wore quickly, but after adding inserts, they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe that goes bad quickly
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way this shoe fit. BUT within 4 weeks of wearing them , the top of the shoe started to crack where your toes are and the soles began to peel off. Now I keep tripping. So basically these shoes are bad if you wear them 5 days a week. Makes me upset because I really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Grube

customer_reviews.title: Work shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfy, but they seem very narrow and are really hot after hours of use. I am a massage therapist and have to be on my feet for hours at a time. I had another pair of FILA so I went with these, but they just arent the same quality. However, the gel cushion is so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Painter

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size!
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest a half size up! Really nice shoe just a tad too small and made my feet feel crammed and hurt. I'm on my feet all day! I tend to pick the memory foam style shoes. These are comfortable at first then as the day goes on my feet kill me! Need more room in the toe area so suggest going up a half size. I am religiously a 9.5 in sneakers and these were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jesscia Gillum

customer_reviews.title: These have held up great in a fast food setting
customer_reviews.text: These have held up great in a fast food setting. They come in a variety of colors and no one even knows I'm wearing slip resistant shoes, but I'm not sliding. The memory foam insert is amazing! I have foot problems but these have never caused me pain!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hall

customer_reviews.title: I originally purchased a slip resistant FILA shoe from a ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a slip resistant FILA shoe from a major retailer and they stood up well and was a worthwhile purchase. Then, I found them for a little bit less expensive here on Amazon and unfortunately, after 1 month, the bottom of the shoe started to come apart and fall off. Also they weren't as "slip-resistant" as the previous shoes (even though they were the same brand/model).
customer_reviews.author: Mytinyketolife

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe but too narrow for my foot and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe but too narrow for my foot and not comfortable for walking 13 hours a day! I returned them with no hassle and very pleased with my transaction with the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Slinkysal

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable with the memory foam and very light weight
customer_reviews.text: I got a part time job at Taco Bell for some extra spending money and needed black slip resistant shoes. These are very comfortable with the memory foam and very light weight. I like that they are shiny, they look good. I would wear these even if not for work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are definitely quality sneakers for a great price. The fit is a bit snug. I would suggest a size up as the size 5 just fits for my daughter but she wont wear them long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So cute, but too small and too stiff  =(
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe, but too stiff and too small for my daughter. So we gave it to someone else. My daughter has a pair of size seven and half Fila women's running shoes that are falling apart. She thought this shoe in seven and a half would work, sadly, it was too small and too stiff. The memory foam was not soft like her other Fila memory foam pair.
customer_reviews.author: C. Suriano

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are mega comfortable! I bought them for a Caribbean island trip I am taking where the hiking can be slippery because of wet leaves. I cannot wait to wear them on my trip! I have big feet and the size 10 fit me nicely, but even a millimeter smaller and I would have had to return them. Also, the memory foam felt super comfy. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but falling a part
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for about 6 months and wear them 3-4 times a week. Just this past week the tred on the bottom has started to come off. They are comfortable but do run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ronk

customer_reviews.title: no toe room
customer_reviews.text: bought this product and had to send it back. The width was perfect and shoe would have been comfortable but for the toe area. I normally wear a 9.5 but went half size larger as other previous comments recommended. Toe area cramped and narrow. to bad
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality - Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy shoes which is the only reason I gave them more than 1 star. I have worn these 3 times for casual use and the treads are flopping off the bottom of the shoe. I have never had this issue with FILA sneakers but this is the first time I have bought them on Amazon. I love the colors, and I love the brand, but something is clearly wrong with the quality of this specific pair I got. I do not know if they are all like that, but I will certainly not be buying another pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wample

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bit tight half sizes would be nice to size up just a schosche
customer_reviews.text: Decent slip resistant shoes. Wore for three months and a lot of tread wore off and The toe is wearing out but... everyone at work has the toes poking out of their shoes maybe from kneeling or getting run over by wheelchairs and hoyers almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable and decently priced.
customer_reviews.text: Colors are the same as in the picture. Light, cool, and the memory foam insole makes walking comfortable. Had another, more expensive brand (initials are NB) and these were less expensive and more comfy. TIme will tell if they are as durable, but for now I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Boog R Man

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 year old daughter. She and I both wear a 7.5. She tried these on and could not get them on her foot. I thought maybe her foot had grown but when I tried them on they were too small. I tried to order a size 8 replacement but none were available so we will be returning these. We were a bit disappointed because we always buy Fila or Ryka and have never had an issue with the fit before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fit as expected & are extremely comfortable. Also very slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit as expected & are extremely comfortable. Also very slip resistant, even on small patches of ice. I work in a bakery and am on my feet 8-9 hours a day. After 5 days of wearing the shoes, the soles started peeling off. I was going to return them, but the comfort outweighed the annoyance. I’ve been slowly cutting off the parts that peel away and they’re still slip resistant & comfortable. I thought maybe I’d buy them again, but after reading more reviews, I’ll be spending my money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I get a lot of compliments on the shoes. I wear them to work, extremely comfortable. Will buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Debra D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and memory foam makes walking like on air
customer_reviews.text: These are like the 10th pair I've owned, and as long as they keep selling them, I will never change! Memory foam insole is amazing and only tennis shoes I've purchased for several years now. They last amazingly well and comfort is top notch, would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & comfy pink shoes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. They are sooooooo cute. :D Just make sure you order a size up. These shoes run small, and returning them is no fun because they're so inexpensive, your return shipping ends up costing about half of what you'll get credited back. So don't doubt my word here, order a size up. :) They're really comfy. I got mine in pink and they are just adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Catazon :)

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for long work hours
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these shoes for ten days and the bottom sole is already coming off. I am sad about the cheap quality, as these shoes are super comfortable, and on the stylish end of slip resistant shoes. I have previously owned the avia slip resistant shoes, and have found they hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes for how lightweight they are
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes for how lightweight they are, BUT, they are the worst shoes I've ever bought. The soles tore off within 3 months. Little by little, each time I wore them a little more would peel off and flap around until I cut them off. I don't think I'll buy Filas anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam makes my feet hurt and I have to wear nonskid. I do not have money to pay for anything else
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Dickman

customer_reviews.title: Bad sneaker base
customer_reviews.text: There was no photo of the bottom of the shoe. I returned them because I’ve had this style bottom from fila before and all the small rubber pieces started falling off. It’s not only bad for support of shoe, but terrible for the environment to be littering pieces of your shoe everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: My toes are right to the end. This is my second pair of Fila shoes. I ordered the same size as the last pair. I suppose it feels a bit short due to the memory foam insole which will eventually break down. Still, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like about these is the tread pattern. It picks up debris so much more than any shoe I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: cake walk
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, true to size. I have problem feet, so when I say it's comfortable, believe me, It's really good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work; happy feet
customer_reviews.text: These show are beyond great... they are really soft and supportive inside, and they are much lighter than I thought they would be. I got the black ones, and I think they are really cute! Much better than the last work shoes I had... I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtnelise

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. First shoe in a long time that does not cause my legs to ache after several hours of wear. Also has helped the heel pain I had been having. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect shoe for me. I need the memory foam to align to my sole. Don't forget what I was told. feels snug but give it a chance to form correctly. I need the wide toe and narrow heel. The shoe does not look like a boat! very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: mlbyron

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this product. I am an RN on my feet twelve hours. No problems with this shoe at all.
customer_reviews.author: herewithme4

customer_reviews.title: ... be more affordable and fits my awkwardly sized feet better then any shoes out there
customer_reviews.text: The brand Fila tends to be more affordable and fits my awkwardly sized feet better then any shoes out there. They also with stand the test of time and don't ware out very easily, unlike my Sketchers that get holes in them within 6 months. I love the colors options that are available and I was so excited to learn that they make slip-resistant shoes for work that aren't black.
customer_reviews.author: Compwolf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent slip resistance
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for slip resistance, but because I’m flat footed I can’t wear these for work as I walk a great deal during my work hours. They are comfortable but lack structure and support for us flat footed boobies
customer_reviews.author: Dee Holla

customer_reviews.title: Okay but...
customer_reviews.text: They’re comfortable and I’ve had 2 pairs of them BUT the nonslip tread is a joke. All it does is stick to the floors making you think they’re sticky. It also peeled off both pairs causing a tripping hazard. I cut off the peeled parts
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Spinneweber

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for the most part and super cute! However not as slip resistant as says
customer_reviews.text: Comfy for the most part and super cute ! However not as slip resistant as says. Would have liked a little more grip on the bottom as actually discribed but for the most part they will work !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife..She has chronic feet and back pain she loves these shoes..says they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: shawn lee johnson

customer_reviews.title: Order whole size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Even tho these fit a little tight and are half size bigger than other shoes they seem to do the job my feet have been hurting so I’m going to give a week or so just because I’m sure it’s because they need broke in, but as far as slipping I work fast food and have not slipped and they seem to keep my feet cool during work
customer_reviews.author: Rharris

customer_reviews.title: not good quality.disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: not very good quality.arrived flawed and didnt fit as expected.wouldnt recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good and you couldn't ask for a better shoe. Nice and roomy
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Payne

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: love the navy and pink color,makes them look pretty together and goes great with what i wear
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Not really impressed with color but will go with uniform. Got for a great price. Slip resistant
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Duffin

customer_reviews.title: Sole is starting to tear after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Sole started to get pilled out don't think this is expected on normal wear work at a hospital and don't feel this is worth it. Only been using them for a little over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Soles fell off
customer_reviews.text: Soles fell off two times of wearing. Had to use super glue. Should've returned but wasn't worth the trouble. Poor quality which surprised me for a name brand Fila shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ed & Bray Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day on a cement floor and these are the shoes I have found yet for foot comfort. My feet feel like they are encased in cotton all day. I absolutely love them and am about to order another pair in a different color. Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this shoe not only is it comfortable, it is perfect since I work on my feet all day in a kitchen ...I'll be getting another pair when I wear these out I have been wearing them every day for a week so far
customer_reviews.author: gerald Brents

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. I wear a size 10 and bought a size 10. Very comfortable wearing them 8+ hrs at work. Slip resistant works very well. Have recommended them to others and they were happy with their purchase also. Will be buying more. No problems with them falling apart and I wear them everyday day for 8+ hrs. Still look brand new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not in it for the long haul...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for work. I’m a waitress. Purchased mid June of this year and I already need new ones. They were very comfortable and I’m disappointed that they didn’t last longer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kahl

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The size is good and they are very comfortable for walking and running BUT the sole began to peel off on the second day. This purchase doesn’t worth the money I payed
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: super cute color, comfy but little small
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very cute and comfortable. I ordered a 1/2 size up because I wear thick socks. I think the shoe runs a little small. I normally wear a 7 and I ordered 7 1/2. It fits good with my regular thin socks, but otherwise I'm very happy with these
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: SOOO I bought these this week and I do like them but defently buy a size up. And I will need a insert for them there is just not enough pad for my heals but standing on a concrete floor for hours is hard on your feet anyways. But I love that they look just like regular tennis shoes and not scrub shoes. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and breathable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I needed comfortable, slip resistant shoes for work that weren't black. I found this pair online and ordered according to the sizing chart, I was pleased when they arrived and fit as specified. I am on my feet for roughly 5 hours a day in these shoes and they fit comfortably from beginning to end. I love that they have a breathable mesh and my feet don't sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tash

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are super comfy and i was SUPER excited to have something other then black when it comes to slip proof. Unfortunately the bottom started peeling off after two days, making them a tripping hazard. Kind of negates the point of slip proof... Guess it's back to basic black...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy. Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the fit, comfort, and colors of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've served for a while now, and I always hurt by the end of a shift. In these, it takes several hours before my feet are finally tired. And even then, it's nothing I can't ignore. These are amazing shoes, and definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Belle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for work. I am on my feet in food service daily for 6 to 8 hours. after only 2 months, the tread is already separating from the sole. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but the sole...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, at first somewhat stiff, narrower than usual but acceptable. The only problem is the non-slip sole, it comes off even after walking less than 1 hour with the shoes. I bought them for medical guards, so I worry how long the sole can withstand.
customer_reviews.author: Hello!

customer_reviews.title: They're comfortable, but they wore out quickly
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable, but they wore out quickly. I received these shoes June 24th of this year and immediately started wearing them. Today, October 2nd, I bought another pair of work shoes (different brand). The toe on these shoes had busted in both shoes, and the ball of the foot was completely bare. I know I'm on my feet a lot but I really expected to get more than 3 months out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn Mann

customer_reviews.title: Defective pieces of junk
customer_reviews.text: There is a hard lump of some kind under the insert right at the joint of the big toe. It is awful and uncomfortable. The shoes are at least one size smaller than they say. Terrible buy. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for a Thrifty Price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. This really helped with the pain in my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit like previous pairs ordered
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is great, I've got 3 pair so far and love them. However the last pair I bought, though they were the same size as the last 2 pair, fit smaller then the others. Not only in width, but length as well so I am unable to wear the shoes for long before my feet hurt.
customer_reviews.author: ALH85

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because they are slip resistant for work in June. By September, a section of the tread had worn smooth on each shoe. I do not have any issues with walking that cause odd wear patterns on my footwear. I expect to replace work shoes once a year, not every 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Victorey

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: After about a week of wear, the tread started to peel away from the shoe making me trip a lot. I tried to glue it back on, sometimes that would work. Save your money and but a better constructed shoe.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Too much to do for me they went up pretty high on my Ankles
customer_reviews.author: Bobbette wish

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but cheaply made :(
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself fits and feels phenomenal however after only 3 days of wearing them only in my class the bottom is peeling off. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ruhlen

customer_reviews.title: Women's Fila Training Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7 1/2 but with Fila, I order a size bigger. The shoe is VERY comfortable and has plenty of support. I've received many compliments on the color.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great price, and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: These worked out perfect for restaurant work, slip resistant yet not the traditional non stylish black shoes. And super comfy. These were listed on another site for $40 and $12 shipping, found these on amazon for $20 and free shipping with Prime. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet size up.
customer_reviews.text: I like tye shoes a lot. They are pretty comfortable except for my pinky toes. I wear wide so i order half a size bigger but my baby toes still rub a little. Over all I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great non slip shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They arent boring white or black. I am a server and on my feet alot. Was unsure how they would hold up but I've had them for 5 months now and they are still comfortable and holding up. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great as far as the nonslip aspect goes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great as far as the nonslip aspect goes. As for the memory foam insole..... They honestly suck. I was really hoping these would be a great shoe for me to be able to wear throughout my work day. Maybe they will once I replace the insole. Because the original ones make my feet hurt so bad I can barely walk once I take them off.
customer_reviews.author: carli williams

customer_reviews.title: Love will buy against n
customer_reviews.text: Love these also love that I could find non slip shoes in such an amazing color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Work shoes that are heavenly sent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for work. These are the best work shoes I have ever owned. I'm a plus size woman and I am constantly on my feet. I really wish all my shoes could feel this good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cordero-Allen

customer_reviews.title: A slip resistant sneaker that's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these at work for months and they are awesome. No more sore feet. I put down miles nightly in these without a problem. I've recommended to coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: lostinthought

customer_reviews.title: Cute but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable. Disappointed the tred is peeling up after only three uses. (Three regular uses, no running or heavy use).
customer_reviews.author: Ashes Bijoux

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear these at the gym or walking the neighborhood. Very comfortable, soft. I alternate wearing them with another pair I purchased to get extended life out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy-O

customer_reviews.title: Sole coming off after 3 hours of wear.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for the first time today for 3 hours at a job orientation, sitting down. Halfway through orientation, I noticed the sole coming off on both shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: ... little small and the non-slip sole was not as good as expected when on tile
customer_reviews.text: Sizes ran a little small and the non-slip sole was not as good as expected when on tile. On cement or carpet it works just fine. Otherwise the shoe is very comfortable to wear and the quality is above average.
customer_reviews.author: DON S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE my new Fila's
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my new Fila's ! I use them for my Zumba class , the colours are so bright and vivid and it's very comfortable as well!!
customer_reviews.author: GypsysRose

customer_reviews.title: but had to hand manipulate them and stretch them in order for them to fit comfortably on the first try
customer_reviews.text: Use this product for work. Fit a bit smaller than expected, but had to hand manipulate them and stretch them in order for them to fit comfortably on the first try! COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but haven’t even owed the shoes for three weeks and they are falling apart. They are definitely not slip resistant either very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Although the last pair in white were fine. I know they weren't meant to be worn ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear orthodics and they were tight in the toes. Although the last pair in white were fine. I know they weren't meant to be worn this way. They first pair are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY WINSKE

customer_reviews.title: Zero Pain
customer_reviews.text: These shoes work great ! I can wear them all day and my feet do not hurt.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Part of the sole lifted!!!
customer_reviews.text: First day wearing the shoes, maybe like 30 minutes and some part of the sole was lifted!!! So disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rascon

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, comfortable and light weight. Stayed the course while walking on slick concrete and tile.
customer_reviews.author: for your interest

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers are very comfortable, light
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are very comfortable, light, and airy. However, I bought them for work and they are not slip resistant. I will keep them for every day walking.
customer_reviews.author: ACST

customer_reviews.title: It’s very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I walked with it for a long day in a roadtrip and it didn’t hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Pietra Puglia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these shoes - super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes - super comfy...but the toe piece is peeling off after only 4 months of rarely wearing them...ordering another pair. Anyone else having this issue??
customer_reviews.author: GuppyF

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, non-slip shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and definitely non-slip. I work on my feet all day and often have to walk across wet concrete which is extremely slippery, and I haven't slipped once in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work thinking they would be very comfortable. They would be if the sizing was true to standard sizing. I bought an 8 1/2 and it fits like a 7 1/2. All my shoes are an 8 1/2. Needless to say I am not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Carleigh Hubert

customer_reviews.title: ... a 1/2 size bigger as suggested and they are perfect. Wanted fila again as the last pair I ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a 1/2 size bigger as suggested and they are perfect. Wanted fila again as the last pair I had lasted well. The previous shoes were the work shoes and I realise now they were not right for me ( too high in the heel and too wide) but these are PERFECT. In them 60 hours a week. They are definitely slip resistant too. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: I buy these shoes quite often, because I work ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes quite often, because I work in a kitchen. I usually have no issue with them but this pair I wore 1 week and the tread is coming apart. Not very impressed with them
customer_reviews.author: Cinberry66

product_meta.title: Fila Women's Memory Fresh Start Slip Resistant Work Shoe
product_meta.description:
Fila training shoes are versatile for athletic use in and out of the gym. Their lateral support, stability and cushion are perfect for light running, weight machines and fitness classes.

Fila began in 1911, in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles, and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inexorably derived from Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury and elegance. This is our birthright, it's in our soul, and it defines our future. We continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for our existence. We create what is desired, not what is necessary. Not just enough, but more than you need. This is Fila.
feature_bullets: Erase your memory and get a fresh start in the lightning-fast Memory Fresh Start SR.
Diamond mesh synthetic upper for air venting with leather overlays.

Fila® brand elements throughout. Textile lining. Memory foam footbed for comfort. Cushioned midsole. Shock absorbing rubber outsole with a grippy, outdoor tread. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 7.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
